document.full_text: rory mcilroy will take a four-stroke lead to the final round of the masters after shooting a two-under 70 on a sweltering saturday at augusta national.
document.title: masters 2011, round 3: mcilroy is the one to beat
lines_and_colors: rory mcilroy will take a four-stroke lead to the final round of the masters after shooting a two-under 70 on a sweltering saturday at augusta national.
